name: Acoustic Drum Kit
description: This acoustic drum kit provides a powerful and authentic drumming experience. It includes a bass drum, snare drum, two tom-toms, a floor tom, and cymbals.

name: Electronic Drum Set
description: This electronic drum set is perfect for quiet practice and versatile performances. It features mesh heads for a realistic feel and multiple sound options.

name: Jazz Drum Kit
description: This jazz drum kit offers a warm and nuanced sound, perfect for jazz and blues performances. It includes a bass drum, snare drum, high tom, low tom, and ride cymbal.

name: Fusion Drum Kit
description: This fusion drum kit combines the power of rock with the finesse of jazz. It includes a bass drum, snare drum, rack toms, floor tom, and crash/ride cymbals.

name: Beginner Drum Set
description: This beginner drum set is perfect for new drummers. It includes all essential components and is designed to provide a comfortable and enjoyable playing experience.
